resources.string: Adjusts the app colors to your background
Activates darkmode compatibility with the timetable and zooms it up
Shows the timetables of the last 8 weeks. Timetables may be incorrect and belong to another class

Timetable app for the vocational College of Bottrop
developed by Paul Brandt from the 1i22a
The app was developed with the programming language Kotlin using the Jetpack Compose framework. The Skrape{It} library is used so that the app can load the timetables from the servers
